Detailed Description

Manager of Kaapi services

An active message is send to a service. A service is an object that inherits from the service interface. A service has a name : a service identifier which is composed by two parts : a library namespace identifier and a user identifier. The namespace identifier allows to segment the name by library usage.

Base class for services

A service is an object that implement one of the following call methods (the method implemented in derived class depend on the way to use the service). The user that want to implement a service should create a class that derivated from Service and re-implement pure virtual methods. Before any use, the service should be bind to a name into the service manager.
